QuestData.Title: WANTED: Yarsel'ghun
QuestData.Description:
By the decree of the Storm's Wake.
Find and kill the foreign spy, Yarsel'ghun.
A foreigner agent hiding on our soil, she is responsible for acts of terrorism against the citizens of Stormsong.
The individual that ends her existence will earn a fitting reward.
QuestData.CompletionText: The wanted poster is nailed to the wall, with tasks etched on it.
